parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.74</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Tree View </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets cursor to given item on given path. IDC means id of parent Tree View. To deselect all items use [-1] for the path param (''available since Arma 3 v1.55.133898'')</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[tvSetCurSel]] [idc, path] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] of [[Number]]s </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control [[tvSetCurSel]] path </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] of [[Number]]s </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[tvSetCurSel]] [101, [0]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_ctrl [[tvSetCurSel]] [0,0,0];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x3 </name>=<value> <code>[] [[spawn]]
{
	[[disableSerialization]];
	_CT_TREE = [[findDisplay]] 46 [[ctrlCreate]] ["RscTree", -1];
	_CT_TREE [[ctrlSetPosition]] [0,0,0.3,1];
	_CT_TREE [[ctrlCommit]] 0;
	_CT_TREE [[tvAdd]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[],"Parent_A"];
	_CT_TREE [[tvAdd]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[0],"Child_A"];
	_CT_TREE [[tvAdd]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[0,0],"Grandchild_A"];
	_CT_TREE [[tvAdd]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[],"Parent_B"];
	_CT_TREE [[tvAdd]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[1],"Child_B"];
	[[sleep]] 1;
	[[hint]] "SELECT [0,0,0]";
	_CT_TREE [[tvSetCurSel]] [0,0,0];
	[[sleep]] 2;
	[[hint]] "DESELECT ALL";
	_CT_TREE [[tvSetCurSel]] [-1];
};</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE3</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[tvAdd]], [[tvClear]], [[tvCollapse]], [[tvCount]], [[tvCurSel]], [[tvData]], [[tvDelete]], [[tvExpand]], [[tvPicture]], [[tvSetData]], [[tvSetPicture]], [[tvSetValue]], [[tvSort]], [[tvSortByValue]], [[tvText]], [[tvValue]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part></template></root>
